verses.t: I waited{H6960} patiently{H6960} Lordfor the {H3068}; and he inclined{H5186} unto me, and heard{H8085} my cry{H7775}.I waited…: Heb. In waiting I waited

He brought me up{H5927} also out of an horrible{H7588} pit{H953}, out of the miry{H3121} clay{H2916}, and set{H6965} my feet{H7272} upon a rock{H5553}, and established{H3559} my goings{H838}.an…: Heb. a pit of noise
And he hath put{H5414} a new{H2319} song{H7892} in my mouth{H6310}, even praise{H8416} unto our God{H430}: many{H7227} shall see{H7200} it, and fear{H3372}, and shall trust{H982} Lordin the {H3068}.
Blessed{H835} is that man{H1397} that maketh{H7760} Lordthe {H3068} his trust{H4009}, and respecteth{H6437}not the proud{H7295}, nor such as turn aside{H7750} to lies{H3577}.

Many{H7227}, LordO {H3068} my God{H430}, are thy wonderful{H6381} works which thou hast done{H6213}, and thy thoughts{H4284} which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order{H6186} unto thee: if I would declare{H5046} and speak{H1696} of them, they are more{H6105} than can be numbered{H5608}.they cannot…: or, none can order them unto thee

Sacrifice{H2077} and offering{H4503} thou didst not desire{H2654}; mine ears{H241} hast thou opened{H3738}: burnt offering{H5930} and sin offering{H2401} hast thou not required{H7592}.opened: Heb. digged
Then said{H559} I, Lo, I come{H935}: in the volume{H4039} of the book{H5612} it is written{H3789} of me,
I delight{H2654} to do{H6213} thy will{H7522}, O my God{H430}: yea, thy law{H8451} is within{H8432} my heart{H4578}.within…: Heb. in the midst of my bowels
I have preached{H1319} righteousness{H6664} in the great{H7227} congregation{H6951}: lo, I have not refrained{H3607} my lips{H8193}, LordO {H3068}, thou knowest{H3045}.

I have not hid{H3680} thy righteousness{H6666} within{H8432} my heart{H3820}; I have declared{H559} thy faithfulness{H530} and thy salvation{H8668}: I have not concealed{H3582} thy lovingkindness{H2617} and thy truth{H571} from the great{H7227} congregation{H6951}.
Withhold{H3607} not thou thy tender mercies{H7356} Lordfrom me, O {H3068}: let thy lovingkindness{H2617} and thy truth{H571} continually{H8548} preserve{H5341} me.

For innumerable{H4557} evils{H7451} have compassed{H661} me about: mine iniquities{H5771} have taken hold{H5381} upon me, so that I am not able{H3201} to look up{H7200}; they are more{H6105} than the hairs{H8185} of mine head{H7218}: therefore my heart{H3820} faileth{H5800} me.faileth: Heb. forsaketh
Be pleased{H7521}, LordO {H3068}, to deliver{H5337} Lordme: O {H3068}, make haste{H2363} to help{H5833} me.

Let them be ashamed{H954} and confounded{H2659} together{H3162} that seek{H1245} after my soul{H5315} to destroy{H5595} it; let them be driven{H5472} backward{H268} and put to shame{H3637} that wish{H2655} me evil{H7451}.
Let them be desolate{H8074} for a reward{H6118} of their shame{H1322} that say{H559} unto me, Aha{H1889}, aha{H1889}.
Let all those that seek{H1245} thee rejoice{H7797} and be glad{H8055} in thee: let such as love{H157} thy salvation{H8668} say{H559} continually{H8548}, LordThe {H3068} be magnified{H1431}.
But I am poor{H6041} and needy{H34}; yet the Lord{H136} thinketh{H2803} upon me: thou art my help{H5833} and my deliverer{H6403}; make no tarrying{H309}, O my God{H430}.
